trans-unit.source: Provides access to local and remote processes and enables you to start and stop local system processes.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso a processos locais e remotos e permite iniciar e parar os processos de sistema local.

trans-unit.source: To browse the .NET Framework source code for this type, see the [Reference Source](http://referencesource.microsoft.com/#System/services/monitoring/system/diagnosticts/Process.cs#f8b2e604d6f1fe04).
trans-unit.target: Para procurar o código-fonte do .NET Framework para este tipo, consulte o [fonte de referência](http://referencesource.microsoft.com/#System/services/monitoring/system/diagnosticts/Process.cs#f8b2e604d6f1fe04).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MachineName%2A> property, the default is the local computer, (".").
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MachineName%2A>propriedade, o padrão é o computador local, (".").</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MachineName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You have two options for associating a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component with a process on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Você tem duas opções para associar um novo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente com um processo no computador.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: The first option is to use the constructor to create the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component, set the appropriate members of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A> property and call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> to associate the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> with a new system process.
trans-unit.target: A primeira opção é usar o construtor para criar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente, definir os membros apropriados a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A>propriedade e chame <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>para associar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>com um novo processo de sistema.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: The second option is to associate the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> with a running system process by using <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> or one of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> return values.
trans-unit.target: A segunda opção é associar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>com um processo de sistema em execução usando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>ou uma da <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>valores de retorno.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: If you use a `static` overload of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> method to start a new system process, the method creates a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component and associates it with the process.
trans-unit.target: Se você usar um `static` de sobrecarga do <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>método para iniciar um novo processo do sistema, o método cria um novo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente e a associa o processo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to its default value, `true`, you can start applications and documents in a way that is similar to using the `Run` dialog box of the Windows `Start` menu.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é definida como seu valor padrão, `true`, você pode iniciar aplicativos e documentos de maneira semelhante ao uso de `Run` caixa de diálogo do Windows `Start` menu.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `false`, you can start only executables.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é `false`, você pode iniciar somente executáveis.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Any executable file that you can call from the command line can be started in one of two ways: by setting the appropriate members of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A> property and calling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> method with no parameters, or by passing the appropriate parameter to the `static`<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> member.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer arquivo executável que você pode chamar a partir da linha de comando pode ser iniciado em uma das duas maneiras: definindo os membros apropriados do <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A>propriedade e chamar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>método sem parâmetros ou passando o parâmetro apropriado para o `static` <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>membro.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component by using the constructor, one of the static <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> overloads, or any of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>, or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente usando o construtor, um estático <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>sobrecargas ou qualquer o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>, ou <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: After you have done so, you have a view into the associated process.
trans-unit.target: Depois de você ter feito isso, você tem uma exibição para o processo associado.

trans-unit.source: This is not a dynamic view that updates itself automatically when the process properties have changed in memory.
trans-unit.target: Isso não é uma exibição dinâmica que se atualiza automaticamente quando as propriedades de processo foram alteradas na memória.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you must call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A> for the component to update the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> property information in your application.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, você deve chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A>para o componente atualizar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>informações de propriedade em seu aplicativo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the base priority of the associated process.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a prioridade básica do processo associado.

trans-unit.source: The BasePriority of the process is the starting priority for threads created within the associated process.
trans-unit.target: BasePriority do processo é a prioridade inicial de threads criados dentro do processo associado.

trans-unit.source: You can view information about the base priority through the System Monitor's Priority Base counter.
trans-unit.target: Você pode exibir informações sobre a prioridade base por meio de contador Base de prioridade do Monitor do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Based on the time elapsed or other boosts, the operating system can change the base priority when a process should be placed ahead of others.
trans-unit.target: Com base no tempo decorrida ou outras aumenta, o sistema operacional pode alterar a prioridade base quando um processo deve ser colocado antes dos outros.

trans-unit.source: The BasePriority property lets you view the starting priority assigned to a process.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade BasePriority lhe permite exibir inicial prioridade atribuída a um processo.

trans-unit.source: However, because it is read-only, you cannot use the BasePriority to set the priority of the process.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, porque ele é somente leitura, você não pode usar o BasePriority para definir a prioridade do processo.

trans-unit.source: To change the priority, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar a prioridade, use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BasePriority is viewable using the System Monitor, while the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A> is not.
trans-unit.target: O BasePriority pode ser visto usando o Monitor do sistema, enquanto o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>não é.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both the BasePriority and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A> can be viewed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Ambos o BasePriority e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>podem ser exibidas programaticamente.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the relationship between BasePriority values and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra a relação entre os valores de BasePriority e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>valores.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: |BasePriority|PriorityClass| |------------------|-------------------| |4|<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>| |8|<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>| |13|<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>| |24|<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>|
trans-unit.target: | BasePriority | Classe de prioridade | |------------------|-------------------| |&4; | <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>| |&8; | <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>| |&13; | <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>| |&24; | <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>|</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass></xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass></xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass></xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>

trans-unit.source: The base priority, which is computed from the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass*> of the associated process.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade base, que é computada a partir de <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass*>do processo associado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass*>

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to access this property on Windows 98 and Windows Me.
trans-unit.target: A plataforma é o Windows 98 ou Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); definir o <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para acessar essa propriedade no Windows 98 e Windows Me.

trans-unit.source: The process has exited.
trans-unit.target: O processo foi encerrado.

trans-unit.source: -or- The process has not started, so there is no process ID.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o processo não foi iniciado, portanto, não há nenhuma ID de processo.

trans-unit.source: Begins asynchronous read operations on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*> stream of the application.
trans-unit.target: Inicia as operações de leitura assíncronas no redirecionamento <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>fluxo do aplicativo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream can be read synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>fluxo pode ser lido de forma síncrona ou assíncrona.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Methods such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> perform synchronous read operations on the error output stream of the process.
trans-unit.target: Métodos como <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, e <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>executar operações de leitura síncronas no fluxo de saída de erro do processo.</xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: These synchronous read operations do not complete until the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream, or closes the stream.
trans-unit.target: Esses síncrona ler operações não concluída até associado <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>grava seu <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>fluxo ou fecha o fluxo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, BeginErrorReadLine starts asynchronous read operations on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, BeginErrorReadLine inicia assíncrona operações de leitura no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method enables the designated event handler for the stream output and immediately returns to the caller, which can perform other work while the stream output is directed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que o manipulador de eventos designado para a saída de fluxo e retorna imediatamente para o chamador, que pode executar outras tarefas enquanto a saída de fluxo é direcionada para o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to perform asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> for a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> : 1.
trans-unit.target: Siga estas etapas para executar operações de leitura assíncronas em <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>para um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>: 1.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> to `false`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardError%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardError%2A> to `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add your event handler to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: Adicione o manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived>evento.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived>

trans-unit.source: The event handler must match the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName> delegate signature.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos deve corresponder a <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName>assinatura do delegado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Start the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.
trans-unit.target: Iniciar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: Call BeginErrorReadLine for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar BeginErrorReadLine para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: This call starts asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Essa chamada inicia as operações de leitura assíncronas em <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: When asynchronous read operations start, the event handler is called each time the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes a line of text to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando iniciar operações de leitura assíncrona, o manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o associado <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>escreve uma linha de texto a seu <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel an asynchronous read operation by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode cancelar uma operação de leitura assíncrona chamando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The read operation can be canceled by the caller or by the event handler.
trans-unit.target: A operação de leitura pode ser cancelada pelo chamador ou pelo manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: After canceling, you can call BeginErrorReadLine again to resume asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: Depois de cancelar, você pode chamar BeginErrorReadLine novamente para retomar as operações de leitura assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You cannot mix asynchronous and synchronous read operations on a redirected stream.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Não é possível misturar operações de leitura síncronas e assíncronas em um fluxo redirecionado.

trans-unit.source: Once the redirected stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> is opened in either asynchronous or synchronous mode, all further read operations on that stream must be in the same mode.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez o fluxo redirecionado de um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>é aberto no modo assíncrono ou síncrono, todas as mais leitura operações no fluxo devem estar no mesmo modo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: For example, do not follow BeginErrorReadLine with a call to <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream, or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, não execute BeginErrorReadLine com uma chamada para <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>fluxo, ou vice-versa.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can read two different streams in different modes.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode ler os dois fluxos diferentes de modos diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call BeginErrorReadLine and then call <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar BeginErrorReadLine e, em seguida, chamar <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: Begins asynchronous read operations on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*> stream of the application.
trans-unit.target: Inicia as operações de leitura assíncronas no redirecionamento <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*>fluxo do aplicativo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream can be read synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>fluxo pode ser lido de forma síncrona ou assíncrona.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: Methods such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> perform synchronous read operations on the output stream of the process.
trans-unit.target: Métodos como <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, e <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>executar operações de leitura síncronas no fluxo de saída do processo.</xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: These synchronous read operations do not complete until the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream, or closes the stream.
trans-unit.target: Esses síncrona ler operações não concluída até associado <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>grava seu <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>fluxo ou fecha o fluxo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, BeginOutputReadLine starts asynchronous read operations on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, BeginOutputReadLine inicia assíncrona operações de leitura no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method enables a designated event handler for the stream output and immediately returns to the caller, which can perform other work while the stream output is directed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que um manipulador de eventos designado para a saída de fluxo e retorna imediatamente para o chamador, que pode executar outras tarefas enquanto a saída de fluxo é direcionada para o manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to perform asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> for a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> : 1.
trans-unit.target: Siga estas etapas para executar operações de leitura assíncronas em <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>para um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>: 1.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> to `false`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput%2A> to `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add your event handler to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: Adicione o manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>evento.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>

trans-unit.source: The event handler must match the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName> delegate signature.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos deve corresponder a <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName>assinatura do delegado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Start the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.
trans-unit.target: Iniciar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: Call BeginOutputReadLine for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar BeginOutputReadLine para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: This call starts asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Essa chamada inicia as operações de leitura assíncronas em <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: When asynchronous read operations start, the event handler is called each time the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes a line of text to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando iniciar operações de leitura assíncrona, o manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o associado <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>escreve uma linha de texto a seu <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel an asynchronous read operation by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode cancelar uma operação de leitura assíncrona chamando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The read operation can be canceled by the caller or by the event handler.
trans-unit.target: A operação de leitura pode ser cancelada pelo chamador ou pelo manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: After canceling, you can call BeginOutputReadLine again to resume asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: Depois de cancelar, você pode chamar BeginOutputReadLine novamente para retomar as operações de leitura assíncronas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You cannot mix asynchronous and synchronous read operations on a redirected stream.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Não é possível misturar operações de leitura síncronas e assíncronas em um fluxo redirecionado.

trans-unit.source: Once the redirected stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> is opened in either asynchronous or synchronous mode, all further read operations on that stream must be in the same mode.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez o fluxo redirecionado de um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>é aberto no modo assíncrono ou síncrono, todas as mais leitura operações no fluxo devem estar no mesmo modo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: For example, do not follow BeginOutputReadLine with a call to <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream, or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, não execute BeginOutputReadLine com uma chamada para <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>fluxo, ou vice-versa.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can read two different streams in different modes.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode ler os dois fluxos diferentes de modos diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call BeginOutputReadLine and then call <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar BeginOutputReadLine e, em seguida, chamar <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous read operation on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*> stream of an application.
trans-unit.target: Cancela o assíncrono da operação de leitura sobre o redirecionamento <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>fluxo de um aplicativo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> starts an asynchronous read operation on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>inicia uma assíncrona operação de leitura no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: CancelErrorRead ends the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: CancelErrorRead termina a operação de leitura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: After canceling, you can resume the asynchronous read operation by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> again.
trans-unit.target: Depois de cancelar, você pode retomar a operação de leitura assíncrona chamando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>novamente.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call CancelErrorRead, all in-progress read operations for <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> are completed and then the event handler is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama CancelErrorRead, em andamento todas as operações de leitura de para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>são concluídas e, em seguida, o manipulador de eventos está desabilitado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: All further redirected output to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> is saved in a buffer.
trans-unit.target: Todos os redirecionado ainda mais a saída para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>é salvo em um buffer.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you re-enable the event handler with a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>, the saved output is sent to the event handler and asynchronous read operations resume.
trans-unit.target: Se você habilitar novamente o manipulador de eventos com uma chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>, a saída a salva é enviada ao manipulador de eventos e retomar operações de leitura assíncronas.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the event handler before resuming asynchronous read operations, you must remove the existing event handler before adding the new event handler: ``` // At this point the DataReceivedEventHandler(ErrorHandler1) // has executed a CancelErrorRead. // Remove the prior event handler. process.ErrorDataReceived -= new DataReceivedEventHandler(ErrorHandler1); // Register a new event handler. process.ErrorDataReceived += new DataReceivedEventHandler(ErrorHandler2); // Call the corresponding BeginErrorReadLine. process.BeginErrorReadLine(); ``` > [!NOTE] > You cannot mix asynchronous and synchronous read operations on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser alterar o manipulador de eventos antes de continuar as operações de leitura assíncronas, você deve remover o manipulador de eventos existente antes de adicionar um novo manipulador de eventos: ``` // At this point the DataReceivedEventHandler(ErrorHandler1) // has executed a CancelErrorRead. // Remove the prior event handler. process.ErrorDataReceived -= new DataReceivedEventHandler(ErrorHandler1); // Register a new event handler. process.ErrorDataReceived += new DataReceivedEventHandler(ErrorHandler2); // Call the corresponding BeginErrorReadLine. process.BeginErrorReadLine(); ``` > [!NOTE] > não é possível misturar operações de leitura síncronas e assíncronas no redirecionamento <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the redirected stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> is opened in either asynchronous or synchronous mode, all further read operations on that stream must be in the same mode.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez o fluxo redirecionado de um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>é aberto no modo assíncrono ou síncrono, todas as mais leitura operações no fluxo devem estar no mesmo modo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: If you cancel an asynchronous read operation on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> and then need to read from the stream again, you must use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> to resume asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: Se você cancelar assíncrona operação de leitura em <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>e, em seguida, é necessário ler do fluxo novamente, você deve usar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>para retomar as operações de leitura assíncronas.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not follow CancelErrorRead with a call to the synchronous read methods of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Não siga CancelErrorRead com uma chamada para os métodos de leitura síncronas de <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>como <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, ou <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>.</xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*> stream is not enabled for asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>fluxo não está habilitado para operações de leitura assíncronas.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous read operation on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*> stream of an application.
trans-unit.target: Cancela o assíncrono da operação de leitura sobre o redirecionamento <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*>fluxo de um aplicativo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> starts an asynchronous read operation on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>inicia uma assíncrona operação de leitura no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: CancelOutputRead ends the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: CancelOutputRead termina a operação de leitura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: After canceling, you can resume asynchronous read operations by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> again.
trans-unit.target: Depois de cancelar, você pode retomar operações de leitura assíncronas chamando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>novamente.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call CancelOutputRead, all in-progress read operations for <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> are completed and then the event handler is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Quando você chama CancelOutputRead, em andamento todas as operações de leitura de para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>são concluídas e, em seguida, o manipulador de eventos está desabilitado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: All further redirected output to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> is saved in a buffer.
trans-unit.target: Todos os redirecionado ainda mais a saída para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>é salvo em um buffer.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you re-enable the event handler with a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>, the saved output is sent to the event handler and asynchronous read operations resume.
trans-unit.target: Se você habilitar novamente o manipulador de eventos com uma chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>, a saída a salva é enviada ao manipulador de eventos e retomar operações de leitura assíncronas.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the event handler before resuming asynchronous read operations, you must remove the existing event handler before adding the new event handler: ``` // At this point the DataReceivedEventHandler(OutputHandler1) // has executed a CancelOutputRead. // Remove the prior event handler. process.OutputDataReceived -= new DataReceivedEventHandler(OutputHandler1); // Register a new event handler. process.OutputDataReceived += new DataReceivedEventHandler(OutputHandler2); // Call the corresponding BeginOutputReadLine. process.BeginOutputReadLine(); ``` > [!NOTE] > You cannot mix asynchronous and synchronous read operations on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser alterar o manipulador de eventos antes de continuar as operações de leitura assíncronas, você deve remover o manipulador de eventos existente antes de adicionar um novo manipulador de eventos: ``` // At this point the DataReceivedEventHandler(OutputHandler1) // has executed a CancelOutputRead. // Remove the prior event handler. process.OutputDataReceived -= new DataReceivedEventHandler(OutputHandler1); // Register a new event handler. process.OutputDataReceived += new DataReceivedEventHandler(OutputHandler2); // Call the corresponding BeginOutputReadLine. process.BeginOutputReadLine(); ``` > [!NOTE] > não é possível misturar operações de leitura síncronas e assíncronas no redirecionamento <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the redirected stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> is opened in either asynchronous or synchronous mode, all further read operations on that stream must be in the same mode.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez o fluxo redirecionado de um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>é aberto no modo assíncrono ou síncrono, todas as mais leitura operações no fluxo devem estar no mesmo modo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: If you cancel an asynchronous read operation on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> and then need to read from the stream again, you must use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> to resume asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: Se você cancelar assíncrona operação de leitura em <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>e, em seguida, é necessário ler do fluxo novamente, você deve usar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>para retomar as operações de leitura assíncronas.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not follow CancelOutputRead with a call to the synchronous read methods of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Não siga CancelOutputRead com uma chamada para os métodos de leitura síncronas de <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>como <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, ou <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>.</xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*> stream is not enabled for asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*>fluxo não está habilitado para operações de leitura assíncronas.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*>

trans-unit.source: Frees all the resources that are associated with this component.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos que estão associados este componente.

trans-unit.source: The Close method causes the process to stop waiting for exit if it was waiting, closes the process handle, and clears process-specific properties.
trans-unit.target: O método Close faz com que o processo de interromper a espera de saída se ele estava aguardando, fecha o identificador de processo e limpa propriedades específicas do processo.

trans-unit.source: Close does not close the standard output, input, and error readers and writers in case they are being referenced externally.
trans-unit.target: Fechar não fecha o gravadores e leitores de saída, de entrada e de erro padrão caso eles estão sendo referenciados externamente.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Dispose%2A> method calls Close.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Dispose%2A>Fechar chamadas de método.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Placing the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> object in a `using` block disposes of resources without the need to call Close.
trans-unit.target: Colocando o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>do objeto em um `using` bloco libera recursos sem a necessidade de chamar Close.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: Closes a process that has a user interface by sending a close message to its main window.
trans-unit.target: Fecha um processo que tenha uma interface de usuário, enviando uma mensagem de fechamento para a janela principal.

trans-unit.source: When a process is executing, its message loop is in a wait state.
trans-unit.target: Quando um processo está em execução, seu loop de mensagem está em estado de espera.

trans-unit.source: The message loop executes every time a Windows message is sent to the process by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O loop de mensagem é executado sempre que uma mensagem do Windows é enviada para o processo pelo sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: Calling CloseMainWindow sends a request to close to the main window, which, in a well-formed application, closes child windows and revokes all running message loops for the application.
trans-unit.target: Chamar CloseMainWindow envia uma solicitação para a próxima janela principal, que, em um aplicativo bem formado, fecha janelas filho e revoga todos executados loops de mensagens para o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The request to exit the process by calling CloseMainWindow does not force the application to quit.
trans-unit.target: A solicitação para sair do processo chamando CloseMainWindow não força o aplicativo para sair.

trans-unit.source: The application can ask for user verification before quitting, or it can refuse to quit.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo pode pedir para verificação do usuário antes de encerrar, ou ele pode recusar sair.

trans-unit.source: To force the application to quit, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para forçar o aplicativo para sair, use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>método.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>

trans-unit.source: The behavior of CloseMainWindow is identical to that of a user closing an application's main window using the system menu.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de CloseMainWindow é idêntico de um usuário fechando a janela principal do aplicativo, usando o menu do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the request to exit the process by closing the main window does not force the application to quit immediately.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, a solicitação para sair do processo, fechando a janela principal não força o aplicativo para ser encerrado imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: Data edited by the process or resources allocated to the process can be lost if you call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Editado pelo processo de dados ou recursos alocados para o processo podem ser perdidos se você chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> causes an abnormal process termination, and should be used only when necessary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>faz com que um encerramento anormal de processo e deve ser usado somente quando necessário.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>

trans-unit.source: CloseMainWindow enables an orderly termination of the process and closes all windows, so it is preferable for applications with an interface.
trans-unit.target: CloseMainWindow permite um encerramento ordenado do processo e fecha todas as janelas, portanto, é preferível para aplicativos com uma interface.

trans-unit.source: If CloseMainWindow fails, you can use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> to terminate the process.
trans-unit.target: Se CloseMainWindow falhar, você pode usar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>para encerrar o processo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> is the only way to terminate processes that do not have graphical interfaces.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>é a única maneira de encerrar os processos que não têm interfaces gráficas.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> and CloseMainWindow only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>e CloseMainWindow somente para processos em execução no computador local.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot cause processes on remote computers to exit.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode fazer com que processos em computadores remotos para sair.

trans-unit.source: You can only view information for processes running on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: Você só pode exibir informações de processos em execução em computadores remotos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the close message was successfully sent; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the associated process does not have a main window or if the main window is disabled (for example if a modal dialog is being shown).
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem de fechamento foi enviada com êxito; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o processo associado não tem uma janela principal ou se a janela principal é desabilitada (por exemplo, se uma caixa de diálogo modal está sendo exibida).

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to access this property on Windows 98 and Windows Me.
trans-unit.target: A plataforma é o Windows 98 ou Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); definir o <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para acessar essa propriedade no Windows 98 e Windows Me.

trans-unit.source: The process has already exited.
trans-unit.target: O processo já foi encerrado.

trans-unit.source: -or- No process is associated with this <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: - ou - nenhum processo está associado a essa <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Release all resources used by this process.
trans-unit.target: Libere todos os recursos usados por esse processo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited"></xref> event should be raised when the process terminates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se o <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited"> </xref> deve ser gerado quando o processo é encerrado.

trans-unit.source: The EnableRaisingEvents property indicates whether the component should be notified when the operating system has shut down a process.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EnableRaisingEvents indica se o componente deve ser notificado quando o sistema operacional foi fechado por um processo.

trans-unit.source: The EnableRaisingEvents property is used in asynchronous processing to notify your application that a process has exited.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EnableRaisingEvents é usada no processamento assíncrono para notificar o aplicativo que um processo foi encerrado.

trans-unit.source: To force your application to synchronously wait for an exit event (which interrupts processing of the application until the exit event has occurred), use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para forçar o aplicativo de forma síncrona espera para um evento de saída (que interrompe o processamento do aplicativo até que o evento de saída ocorreu), use o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>método.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are using Visual Studio and double-click a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component in your project, an <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event delegate and event handler are automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se você estiver usando o Visual Studio e clique duas vezes em um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente no seu projeto, um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>delegado do evento e o manipulador de eventos são gerados automaticamente.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: Additional code sets the EnableRaisingEvents property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Código adicional define a propriedade EnableRaisingEvents `false`.

trans-unit.source: You must change this property to `true` for your event handler to be executed when the associated process exits.
trans-unit.target: Você deve alterar essa propriedade como `true` para o manipulador de eventos a ser executado quando o processo associado for encerrado.

trans-unit.source: When an associated process exits after being shut down by the operating system either through a normal or abnormal termination, the operating system notifies each process component to which the process was associated, as long as the component's EnableRaisingEvents value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando um processo associado foi encerrado após sendo desligado pelo sistema operacional ou por meio de um encerramento normal ou anormal, o sistema operacional notifica cada componente do processo ao qual o processo foi associado, como o valor do componente EnableRaisingEvents é `true`.

trans-unit.source: If a component started the process, the component can then access the administrative information for the associated process, which is still being stored by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Se um componente iniciado o processo, o componente pode acessar as informações administrativas para o processo associado, que ainda está sendo armazenado pelo sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: Such information includes the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>, and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Essas informações incluem o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the associated process exits, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A> of the component no longer points to an existing process resource.
trans-unit.target: Depois que o processo associado for encerrado, o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>do componente não aponta para um recurso existente do processo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it can be used only to access the operating system's information about the process resource.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, ele pode ser usado somente para acessar informações do sistema operacional sobre o recurso de processo.

trans-unit.source: The operating system is aware that there are handles to exited processes that have not been released by <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components, so it keeps the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A> information in memory.
trans-unit.target: O sistema operacional está ciente de que há identificadores encerrados processos que não foram liberados por <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componentes, para que ele mantém o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>informações na memória.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: There is a cost associated with watching for a process to exit.
trans-unit.target: Há um custo associado observando um processo sair.

trans-unit.source: If EnableRaisingEvents is `true`, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event is raised when the associated process terminates.
trans-unit.target: Se for EnableRaisingEvents `true`, o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>evento é gerado quando o processo associado será encerrado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>

trans-unit.source: The procedures that you have specified for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event run at that time.
trans-unit.target: Os procedimentos que você especificou para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>eventos que são executados nesse horário.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, your application starts a process but does not need to be notified of its closure.
trans-unit.target: Às vezes, seu aplicativo inicia um processo, mas não precisa ser notificado sobre seu fechamento.

trans-unit.source: For example, your application can start Notepad to allow the user to perform text editing, but make no further use of the Notepad application.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, seu aplicativo pode iniciar o bloco de notas para permitir que o usuário efetue a edição de texto, mas nenhuma outra fazer uso do aplicativo bloco de notas.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to not be notified when the process exits, because it is not relevant to the continued operation of your application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode optar por não ser notificado quando o processo foi encerrado, porque ele não é relevante para a operação contínua de seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Setting EnableRaisingEvents to `false` saves system resources.
trans-unit.target: Definindo EnableRaisingEvents como `false` salva os recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited"></xref> event should be raised when the associated process is terminated (through either an exit or a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill*>); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited"> </xref> deve ser gerado quando o processo associado foi finalizado (por meio de uma saída ou uma chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill*>); caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Puts a <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> component in state to interact with operating system processes that run in a special mode by enabling the native property <xref uid="langword_csharp_SeDebugPrivilege" name="SeDebugPrivilege" href=""></xref> on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Coloca um <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> componente no estado para interagir com o sistema operacional processos executados em um modo especial, permitindo que a propriedade nativo <xref uid="langword_csharp_SeDebugPrivilege" name="SeDebugPrivilege" href=""> </xref> no thread atual.

trans-unit.source: Some operating system processes run in a special mode.
trans-unit.target: Alguns processos do sistema operacional executado em um modo especial.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to read properties of or attach to these processes is not possible unless you have called EnterDebugMode on the component.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível tentar ler as propriedades de ou anexar a esses processos, a menos que você chamou EnterDebugMode no componente.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.LeaveDebugMode%2A> when you no longer need access to these processes that run in special mode.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.LeaveDebugMode%2A>quando você não precisa mais acesso a esses processos que são executados em modo especial.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.LeaveDebugMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an application writes to its redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*> stream.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um aplicativo grava seu redirecionado <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>

trans-unit.source: The ErrorDataReceived event indicates that the associated process has written to its redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: O evento ErrorDataReceived indica que o processo associado foi gravados seu redirecionado <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event only occurs during asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O evento ocorre apenas durante operações de leitura assíncronas em <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: To start asynchronous read operations, you must redirect the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>, add your event handler to the ErrorDataReceived event, and call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para iniciar as operações de leitura assíncronas, você deve redirecionar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>fluxo de um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>, adicione o manipulador de eventos para o evento ErrorDataReceived e chame <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Thereafter, the ErrorDataReceived event signals each time the process writes a line to the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream, until the process exits or calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Depois disso, os sinais de evento ErrorDataReceived cada vez que o processo grava uma linha no redirecionamento <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>fluxo, até que o processo foi encerrado ou chamadas <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The application that is processing the asynchronous output should call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method to ensure that the output buffer has been flushed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O aplicativo que está processando a saída assíncrona deve chamar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>método para garantir que o buffer de saída foi liberado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that the associated process specified when it terminated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor que o processo associado especificado quando ele terminar.

trans-unit.source: Use ExitCode to get the status that the system process returned when it exited.
trans-unit.target: Use ExitCode para obter o status que o processo de sistema retornado quando ele foi encerrado.

trans-unit.source: You can use the exit code much like an integer return value from a `main()` procedure.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o código de saída muito, como um número inteiro retornar o valor de uma `main()` procedimento.

trans-unit.source: The ExitCode value for a process reflects the specific convention implemented by the application developer for that process.
trans-unit.target: O valor de ExitCode para um processo reflete a convenção específica implementada pelo desenvolvedor do aplicativo para que o processo.

trans-unit.source: If you use the exit code value to make decisions in your code, be sure that you know the exit code convention used by the application process.
trans-unit.target: Se você usar o valor de código de saída para tomar decisões em seu código, certifique-se de que você sabe que a convenção de código de saída usada pelo processo de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Developers usually indicate a successful exit by an ExitCode value of zero, and designate errors by nonzero values that the calling method can use to identify the cause of an abnormal process termination.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores geralmente indicam uma saída com êxito por um valor ExitCode zero e designar erros por valores diferentes de zero e o método de chamada pode usar para identificar a causa do encerramento de um processo anormal.

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to follow these guidelines, but they are the convention.
trans-unit.target: Não é necessário seguir essas diretrizes, mas eles são a convenção.

trans-unit.source: If you try to get the ExitCode before the process has exited, the attempt throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se você tentar obter o ExitCode antes que o processo foi encerrado, a tentativa de lança uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: Examine the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> property first to verify whether the associated process has terminated.
trans-unit.target: Examine o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>propriedade primeiro para verificar se o processo associado foi encerrado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When standard output has been redirected to asynchronous event handlers, it is possible that output processing will not have completed when <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando a saída padrão foi redirecionada para manipuladores de eventos assíncrono, é possível que o processamento de saída terá não concluído quando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>retorna `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that asynchronous event handling has been completed, call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit> overload that takes no parameter before checking <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir que a manipulação de eventos assíncrona foi concluída, chame a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit>sobrecarga que não utiliza nenhum parâmetro antes de verificar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> or the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> method to cause an associated process to exit.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>ou o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>método para fazer com que um processo associado ao sair.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of being notified when the associated process exits: synchronously and asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras de ser notificado quando o processo associado for encerrado: modo síncrono e assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: Synchronous notification relies on calling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method to pause the processing of your application until the associated component exits.
trans-unit.target: Notificação síncrona depende de chamar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>método para pausar o processamento de seu aplicativo até que o componente associado será encerrado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous notification relies on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event.
trans-unit.target: Notificação assíncrona depende de <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>evento.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>

trans-unit.source: When using asynchronous notification, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> must be set to `true` for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component to receive notification that the process has exited.
trans-unit.target: Ao usar a notificação assíncrona, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>deve ser definido como `true` para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente para receber a notificação de que o processo foi encerrado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The code that the associated process specified when it terminated.
trans-unit.target: O código que o processo associado especificado quando ele terminar.

trans-unit.source: The process has not exited.
trans-unit.target: O processo não foi encerrado.

trans-unit.source: -or- The process <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle*> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: o processo - ou - <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle*>não é válido.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle*>

trans-unit.source: You are trying to access the ExitCode property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: Você está tentando acessar a propriedade ExitCode para um processo que está em execução em um computador remoto.

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade está disponível somente para processos em execução no computador local.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a process exits.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um processo foi encerrado.

trans-unit.source: The Exited event indicates that the associated process exited.
trans-unit.target: O evento Exited indica que o processo associado foi encerrado.

trans-unit.source: This occurrence means either that the process terminated (aborted) or successfully closed.
trans-unit.target: Essa ocorrência significa que o processo encerrado (interrompida) ou fechada com êxito.

trans-unit.source: This event can occur only if the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento pode ocorrer somente se o valor de <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>é de propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of being notified when the associated process exits: synchronously and asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Há duas maneiras de ser notificado quando o processo associado for encerrado: modo síncrono e assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: Synchronous notification means calling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method to block the current thread until the process exits.
trans-unit.target: Notificação síncrona significa chamar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>método para bloquear o thread atual até que o processo foi encerrado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous notification uses the Exited event, which allows the calling thread to continue execution in the meantime.
trans-unit.target: Notificação assíncrona usa o evento Exited, que permite que o thread de chamada continuar a execução nesse meio tempo.

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> must be set to `true` for the calling application to receive the Exited event.
trans-unit.target: No último caso, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>deve ser definido como `true` para o aplicativo de chamada receber o evento Exited.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the operating system shuts down a process, it notifies all other processes that have registered handlers for the Exited event.
trans-unit.target: Quando o sistema operacional é desligado por um processo, ele notifica todos os outros processos que registraram manipuladores para o evento Exited.

trans-unit.source: At this time, the handle of the process that just exited can be used to access some properties such as <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> that the operating system maintains until it releases that handle completely.
trans-unit.target: Neste momento, o identificador do processo que acabou de sair pode ser usado para acessar algumas propriedades como <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>que o sistema operacional mantém até que ele libera esse identificador completamente.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Even if you have a handle to an exited process, you cannot call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> again to reconnect to the same process.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Mesmo se você tiver um identificador para um processo encerrado, não é possível chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>novamente para reconectar-se para o mesmo processo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> automatically releases the associated process and connects to a process with the same file but an entirely new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>automaticamente libera o processo associado e se conecta a um processo com o mesmo arquivo, mas um totalmente novo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the use of the Exited event in Windows Forms applications, see the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.SynchronizingObject%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o uso do evento Exited em aplicativos de formulários do Windows, consulte o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.SynchronizingObject%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.SynchronizingObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time that the associated process exited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a hora em que o processo associado foi encerrado.

trans-unit.source: If the process has not terminated, attempting to retrieve the ExitTime property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o processo não foi encerrado, a tentativa de recuperar a propriedade ExitTime lança uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> before getting the ExitTime property to determine whether the associated process has terminated.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>antes de obter a propriedade ExitTime para determinar se o processo associado foi encerrado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that indicates when the associated process was terminated.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DateTime>que indica quando o processo associado foi encerrado.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me), which does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: A plataforma é o Windows 98 ou Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me), que não dá suporte a essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You are trying to access the ExitTime property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: Você está tentando acessar a propriedade ExitTime para um processo que está em execução em um computador remoto.

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade está disponível somente para processos em execução no computador local.

trans-unit.source: Gets a new <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> component and associates it with the currently active process.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma nova <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> componente e a associa o processo ativo no momento.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> instance and associate it with the process resource on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para criar um novo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>instância e associá-lo com o recurso de processo no computador local.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: Like the similar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> methods, GetCurrentProcess associates an existing resource with a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component.
trans-unit.target: Como o semelhante <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>, e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>métodos, GetCurrentProcess associa um recurso existente com um novo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> component associated with the process resource that is running the calling application.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> componente associado ao recurso de processo que está executando o aplicativo de chamada.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> component, given the identifier of a process on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um novo <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> componente, considerando o identificador de um processo no computador local.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component and associate it with a process resource on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para criar um novo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente e associá-lo a um recurso de processo no computador local.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: The process resource must already exist on the computer, because GetProcessById does not create a system resource, but rather associates a resource with an application-generated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component.
trans-unit.target: O recurso de processo já deve existir no computador, porque GetProcessById não cria um recurso do sistema, mas em vez disso, associa um recurso com um aplicativo gerado <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: A process <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> can be retrieved only for a process that is currently running on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Um processo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>pode ser recuperado somente para um processo que está sendo executado no computador.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the process terminates, GetProcessById throws an exception if you pass it an expired identifier.
trans-unit.target: Depois que o processo termina, GetProcessById lança uma exceção se você passar um identificador expirado.

trans-unit.source: On any particular computer, the identifier of a process is unique.
trans-unit.target: Em qualquer computador em particular, o identificador de um processo é exclusivo.

trans-unit.source: GetProcessById returns one process at most.
trans-unit.target: GetProcessById retorna um processo no máximo.

trans-unit.source: If you want to get all the processes running a particular application, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29>.
trans-unit.target: Se você deseja obter todos os processos em execução de um aplicativo específico, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: If multiple processes exist on the computer running the specified application, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29> returns an array containing all the associated processes.
